channel.title: [PI] NPCs turn agressive when itemonobject is used?
channel.description: Is there a way to do this?

item.title: [PI] NPCs turn agressive when itemonobject is used?
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

ItemOnObject.java packet, something like:

[code] if(UseItem.ItemonObject(c, objectId, objectX, objectY, itemId)) {
/**
* Makes the npc aggressive.
*/
CombatHandler.agressiveNpc = true;//add method here that makes npc’s aggressive.

	}[/code]

you’ll then have to make the ItemOnObject method in the UseItem class a boolean, as it’s in an if-statement.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] NPCs turn agressive when itemonobject is used?

item.title: [PI] NPCs turn agressive when itemonobject is used?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I think there is… Make a check of the npcs within a certain distance, or that specific region and set whether they’re aggressive or not towards the player who used the item on object.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] NPCs turn agressive when itemonobject is used?
